returns._0: matches Array of all matches for the agent

params.limit: Maximum number of results to return

returns._0: address[] Array of authorized server addresses
matches Array of matches between the two agents (from agentId1's perspective)
bool True if the address is an authorized server

params.serverAddress: The address of the server to authorize

params.agentId: The agent that played the match
params.matchLogHash: Hash of the match log for verification

params.serverAddress: The address of the server to remove

getAgentMatchCount(uint256).notice: Get total number of matches for an agent

getAgentMatchStats(uint256).notice: Get match statistics for an agent

getAgentMatches(uint256).notice: Get all match results for an agent

owner().notice: Get the owner address from parent IdentityRegistry

submitMatchResult(uint256,uint256,uint8,.notice: Submit a match result (only authorized servers)
